ai-atk-abh03a48:2_1: Now comes the root of the skillful, at the root of the skillful, and transmigrating the teaching of the Dhamma, except for the purpose of preventing the one who is satisfied.
ai-atk-abh03a48:2_2: Herein, the entire mass of aggregates are to be understood in the way already described.
ai-atk-abh03a48:2_3: Just as a great leaf palace floor covers the three leaf-huters have vanished, and the three lay states have disappeared.
ai-atk-abh03a48:2_4: “He who develops the skillful teaching give up the unskillful and develops the skillful, but who does not completely understand the development of the skillful.”
ai-atk-abh03a48:2_5: Herein, the Dhamma should be given up, and not be given up, let alone all that.
ai-atk-abh03a48:2_6: But the three kinds of misconduct should be understood as profitable trickling working out the three beginning with the profitable states, etc., and according to the Vinayapabbata and of the About Ones, etc., and also the abode of root, etc., because it can be understood as the root of the texts, and so on.
ai-atk-abh03a48:4_1: But the skillful quality is called “perfected” because it is wholesome law” and “profitable states”.
